import { Scrollbars } from 'react-custom-scrollbars-2'; import { CloseIcon } from '../../shared/icons/CloseIcon'; import { Button } from '../../shared/buttons/button/Button'; import css from './column.module.scss'; export const Column = ({tasks, inputValue, title, context})=>{ return (
{title}
